controls.title: CyQu has an incident response plan (IRP) in place
controls.description: CyQu maintains a documented incident response plan describing processes and responsibilities for identifying, responding to, and learning from security incidents.

controls.title: Data is divided between multiple AWS regions
controls.description: CyQu data is divided between multiple AWS regions to support resiliency and regional operations where applicable.

controls.title: All compute runs within a private VPC and subnet
controls.description: Compute resources run in private networks to reduce exposure and enforce controlled ingress and egress.

controls.title: Logs are monitored 24/7
controls.description: Security and audit logs are monitored continuously to support detection, triage, and incident response.

controls.title: The API sits behind a WAF
controls.description: A Web Application Firewall (WAF) is used to filter and monitor HTTP requests and reduce exposure to common attacks.

controls.title: CyQu receives a yearly external pentest
controls.description: Third-party security firms conduct periodic penetration tests to identify and remediate vulnerabilities.

controls.title: CyQu is secure by design and by default
controls.description: Security best practices are incorporated into design and development workflows as a default expectation.

controls.title: Data is encrypted in transit
controls.description: TLS 1.2+ is used to encrypt data in transit.

controls.title: Data is encrypted at rest
controls.description: Data at rest is protected using industry standard encryption (e.g., AES-256 where applicable).

controls.title: Company laptops are encrypted and disposed of securely
controls.description: Endpoints use full disk encryption and follow secure wipe and/or destruction procedures at end of life.

controls.title: Engineers receive secure development training
controls.description: Secure development training covers topics like threat modeling, secure coding, and vulnerability management.

controls.title: Code reviews are conducted for all changes
controls.description: Peer review is required to reduce defects and identify security issues before changes ship.

controls.title: The application is regularly scanned for vulnerabilities
controls.description: Automated scanning (e.g., SAST) is used to detect issues early in the development lifecycle.

controls.title: Software is deployed via an automated CI system
controls.description: Automated pipelines support repeatable builds and controlled releases.

controls.title: Background checks are conducted for job applicants
controls.description: Pre-employment screening is performed for applicable roles to reduce insider risk.

controls.title: Security policies are based on recognized frameworks
controls.description: Policies and standards align to recognized security frameworks (e.g., NIST / ISO) where applicable.

controls.title: Multi-factor authentication (MFA) is enforced
controls.description: MFA is required for privileged access and high-risk operations to reduce account takeover risk.

controls.title: Least privilege access is enforced
controls.description: Access is limited to what users and services need to do their job, with periodic review of permissions.

controls.title: Access reviews are performed periodically
controls.description: Access rights are reviewed to ensure permissions remain appropriate as roles and systems change.

controls.title: Backups are performed and periodically tested
controls.description: Backups support recovery objectives and are tested to validate restore procedures.

controls.title: Business continuity procedures are documented
controls.description: Continuity and recovery procedures support planned response to disruptions and incidents.

controls.title: Data minimization is practiced
controls.description: Only necessary data is collected and retained for as long as needed for legitimate business purposes.

controls.title: Vendor security due diligence is performed
controls.description: Third parties are evaluated for security risk and contractual requirements before integration.

controls.title: Secrets are managed and rotated
controls.description: Secrets are stored in secure systems and rotated based on risk and operational needs.
